entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
